entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who is talking to Harry about his broomstick and the Whomping Willow.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is talking to Lupin about his broomstick and the dementors.

entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: The Whomping Willow is a tree that was planted at Hogwarts and is known for being aggressive.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who has refused to let dementors inside the grounds.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that have been growing restless and furious at Professor Dumbledore's refusal to let them inside the grounds.

entities.name: harry's broomstick
entities.description: Harry's broomstick was smashed by the Whomping Willow.

entities.name: davey gudgeon
entities.description: Davey Gudgeon is a boy who nearly lost an eye trying to touch the trunk of the Whomping Willow.

relationships.description: Harry's broomstick was smashed by the Whomping Willow.
Lupin is talking to Harry about Professor Dumbledore's refusal to let dementors inside the grounds.
Dementors were the reason Harry fell.
People used to play a game trying to get near enough to touch the trunk of the Whomping Willow.
Professor Dumbledore has refused to let dementors inside the grounds.
